professionalAchievements.title: Cybersecurity & Networking Internship
professionalAchievements.description: Completed a hands-on internship with IBM and Cisco CCNA in December 2024, gaining skills in cybersecurity protocols and network configuration.

professionalAchievements.title: Data Structures and Algorithms in Java Certification
professionalAchievements.description: Completed an 8 Weeks NPTEL Course and gained knowledge about data structures and algorithms.

professionalAchievements.title: Active Campus Leadership
professionalAchievements.description: Contributed to technical events and media activities as part of CSI, SPACE, and the Student Placement Cell at SJCEM.

projects.title: Land Rover for Earthquake Rescue
projects.description: Built a prototype rover designed to assist in earthquake rescue missions. Integrated soil sensors, temperature sensors, and infrared detection.

projects.title: Network Security Simulation (Cisco Packet Tracer)
projects.description: Simulated a secure enterprise network using Cisco Packet Tracer with routers, firewalls, and VLANs.
